content.title: Intro
content.content:

Year

1908

Tolkien-related events that took place in 1907.

content.title: February
content.content: 21 - W.H. Auden, friend of Tolkien, is born.

content.title: April
content.content: 23 - Author Paul H. Kocher is born.

content.title: May
content.content: 9 - J.R.R. Tolkien receives the book Dictionary in Englysshe and Welshe.

content.title: November
content.content: 27 - Author L. Sprague de Camp is born.

content.title: December
content.content: 13 - Ebba-Margareta von Freymann, a German poetess who would translate the poems in The Lord of the Rings for Margaret Carroux, is born.

? - Actor Duncan McIntyre is born.
? - Scholar I.L. Gordon is born.
Autumn - Tolkien starts creating the Naffarin language.
Years
1904 1905 1906 1907 1908 1909 1910
